title: Land for sale in Thalawathugoda
details:
Gramodaya Mawatha, off Kalalgoda Road, Thalawatugoda.

Looking to build your modern dream home in Thalawathugoda? Take advantage of this unique opportunity to secure this 10 Perch land facing to a Paddy Field and a small water stream and situated in one of the best residential areas in Thalawathugoda with newly built houses.

With the perfect size of 10 Perches and slightly sloping towards to the Paddy Field, you can have variety architectural options and designs for your dream home. Relax and enjoy nature from your dream home. Finding such a vacant block is rare in Thalawathugoda.

Natural ground level 3 to 4 Ft. above Paddy Field, no flood risk. Approx. 15 Lakhs worth of a retaining wall and boundary walls to two sides had been constructed.

Position in a convenience location, close to all amenities to suite busy lifestyles. Easy access to Supermarkets, Schools, Sri Jayawardenepura general hospital, Hemas Hospital, Parliament ground and Athurugiriya highway entrance.

1.15 million per perch (Negotiable, highest offer will be considered)

No Brokers please. If you are really interested only please message/ email me for further details.
